tool_description:
Similar features as Quora but limited to college/university.

University + Community = Univcomm
name: Univcomm
title: Univcomm

api_list.name: /admin/users
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://univcomm1.p.rapidapi.com/admin/users"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "univcomm1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
